Taken on board.) Mr. Vivek Kantawala a/w. Mr. Amey Patil and Mr. Shanay Bafna, i/b. Vivek M. Sharma for petitioners. Mr. Nitin Thakkar, Senior Advocate, a/w. Ms. Priya Ranade and Ms. Nupur Desai, i/b. Markand Gandhi & Co. for respondent No.2. Mr. Milind Prabhune for respondent No.3 and for petitioner in MPT/243/22. CORAM : MANISH PITALE, J. DATE : th APRIL, 2024 P.C. : . This is a petition seeking revocation of grant of probate. This Court is informed that Miscellaneous Petition No.243 of 2022 is also filed before this Court, seeking revocation of the said petition. . It would be in the interest of justice that both the petitions are taken up for consideration together. . This Court is informed that respondent No.1, who was one of the two executors, has, in the meanwhile, expired, during the pendency of the /2 _MPTL_144_24.doc petitions. The other executor is respondent No.2 in these petitions and hence, the name of respondent No.1 can be deleted from the array of respondents in both the petitions. . In fact, in Miscellaneous Petition No.243 of 2022, Interim Application (Lodging) No. 12643 of 2024 appears to have been filed for bringing on record legal heirs of the deceased executor (respondent No.1). In that light, Miscellaneous Petition No.243 of 2022 alongwith the said pending application, is taken on board. .
